TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UTF7Encoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: 代表 Unicode 字元的 UTF-7 編碼方式。

span.span: Represents a UTF-7 encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. Utf-7 編碼方式以 7 位元的 ASCII 字元的序列表示 Unicode 字元。The UTF-7 encoding represents Unicode characters as sequences of 7-bit ASCII characters. 這種編碼支援特定它是必要的通訊協定，多半是電子郵件或新聞群組通訊協定。This encoding supports certain protocols for which it is required, most often email or newsgroup protocols. 由於 utf-7 並沒有特別安全或穩固，而且大多數最新型的系統允許的 8 位元編碼方式，通常應 utf-7 比 utf-8。Since UTF-7 is not particularly secure or robust, and most modern systems allow 8-bit encodings, UTF-8 should normally be preferred to UTF-7. > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，應用程式應該使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, the application should use , , or and enable error detection. 如需有關 UTFs 和其他支援的編碼，請參閱[字元編碼方式在.NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元編碼和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同樣地，方法會判斷多少個字元產生的位元組序列解碼和和方法會執行實際的解碼。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 對應至 Windows 字碼頁 65000。 corresponds to the Windows code page 65000. > [!NOTE] > 如果物件序列化和還原序列化使用不同的.NET Framework 版本，不會保留 utf-7 編碼物件的狀態。The state of a UTF-7 encoded object is not preserved if the object is serialized and deserialized using different .NET Framework versions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用編碼的 Unicode 字元字串，並將它們儲存在位元組陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to encode a string of Unicode characters and store them in a byte array. 請注意，當回字串解碼的位元組陣列，不會遺失任何資料。Notice that when the byte array is decoded back to a string, no data is lost. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立不允許選擇性的字元執行個體。This constructor creates an instance that does not allow optional characters. 呼叫建構函式相當於呼叫建構函式`allowOptionals`參數並指定`false`該參數。Calling the constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor that takes an `allowOptionals` parameter and specifying `false` for that parameter. 如果執行個體允許選擇性字元，以對應的選擇性字元，而不是修改過的基底 64 字元編碼的 Unicode 字碼指標。If an instance allows optional characters, Unicode code points are encoded with a corresponding optional character instead of a modified base 64 character. 選擇性字元都是驚嘆號 ("！")，反斜線 ("\\")，垂直線 ("|")，雙引號 (""")，數字符號 （"#"）、 錢幣符號 （"$"）、 百分比符號 （"%"）、 連字號 ("&")、 星號 ("\*")，分號 （";"），向左角括號 ("\<")，右角括號 (">")，左大括號 ("{")，右大括號 ("}")，左側的大括號 ("[")，右方括號 ("]")，等號 （"="），在登 ("@")，曲折 ("^")、 底線 ("_")，以及抑腔調字 ("'")。The optional characters are exclamation point ("!"), backward slash ("\\"), vertical line ("|"), double quote ("""), number sign ("#"), dollar sign ("$"), percent sign ("%"), ampersand ("&"), asterisk ("\*"), semicolon (";"), left angle bracket ("\<"), right angle bracket (">"), left curly bracket ("{"), right curly bracket ("}"), left square bracket ("["), right square bracket ("]"), equal sign ("="), at sign ("@"), circumflex accent ("^"), underscore ("_"), and grave accent ("\`"). > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新執行個體，並顯示名稱的編碼方式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance and display the name of the encoding. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果執行個體允許選擇性字元，以對應的選擇性字元，而不是修改過的基底 64 字元編碼的 Unicode 字碼指標。If an instance allows optional characters, Unicode code points are encoded with a corresponding optional character instead of a modified base 64 character. 選擇性字元都是驚嘆號 ("！")，反斜線 ("\\")，垂直線 ("|")，雙引號 (""")，數字符號 （"#"）、 錢幣符號 （"$"）、 百分比符號 （"%"）、 連字號 ("&")、 星號 ("\*")，分號 （";"），向左角括號 ("\<")，右角括號 (">")，左大括號 ("{")，右大括號 ("}")，左側的大括號 ("[")，右方括號 ("]")，等號 （"="），在登 ("@")，曲折 ("^")、 底線 ("_")，以及抑腔調字 ("'")。The optional characters are exclamation point ("!"), backward slash ("\\"), vertical line ("|"), double quote ("""), number sign ("#"), dollar sign ("$"), percent sign ("%"), ampersand ("&"), asterisk ("\*"), semicolon (";"), left angle bracket ("\<"), right angle bracket (">"), left curly bracket ("{"), right curly bracket ("}"), left square bracket ("["), right square bracket ("]"), equal sign ("="), at sign ("@"), circumflex accent ("^"), underscore ("_"), and grave accent ("\`"). > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新允許使用選擇性字元的執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance that allows optional characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CPP/ctor-boolean.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CS/ctor-boolean.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/VB/ctor-boolean.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個物件是否相等，如果它們都允許或不允許選擇性字元，而且如果其基礎和屬性是否相等。Two objects are equal if they both either allow or disallow optional characters, and if their underlying and properties are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算確切的陣列大小的需要儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size that requires to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法傳回的字元陣列編碼所需的位元組數目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the number of bytes required to encode a character array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能只適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 無效的字元都會編碼為修改過的基底 64 字元。Invalid characters are encoded as a modified base 64 character. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能只適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 無效的字元都會編碼為修改過的基底 64 字元。Invalid characters are encoded as a modified base 64 character. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將編碼的字元範圍並將編碼的位元組儲存在位元組陣列中的項目範圍。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of characters from a and store the encoded bytes in a range of elements in a byte array. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example/CPP/getbytes-char[]-int32-int32-byte[]-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example/CS/getbytes-char[]-int32-int32-byte[]-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetBytes Example/VB/getbytes-char[]-int32-int32-byte[]-int32.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetChars (byte* bytes, int byteCount, char* chars, int charCount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetChars(unsigned int8* bytes, int32 byteCount, char* chars, int32 charCount) cil managed
public: override int GetChars(System::Byte* bytes, int byteCount, char* chars, int charCount);

param.name: bytes
param.span: 要解碼的第一個位元組指標。

span.span: A pointer to the first byte to decode.

param.name: byteCount
param.span: 要解碼的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to decode.

param.name: chars
param.span: 開始寫入產生的一組字元之位置指標。

span.span: A pointer to the location at which to start writing the resulting set of characters.

param.name: charCount
param.span: 要寫入的最大字元數。

span.span: The maximum number of characters to write.

summary.span: 將起始於指定位元組指標的位元組序列解碼成一組字元；儲存該組字元時，係以指定的字元指標為起始點。

span.span: Decodes a sequence of bytes starting at the specified byte pointer into a set of characters that are stored starting at the specified character pointer.

returns.span: 在 所表示的位置上寫入的實際字元數。

span.span: The actual number of characters written at the location indicated by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小來儲存產生的字元，使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting characters, use . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能只適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 當遇到無效的位元組時，通常會發出的無效位元組。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果大於十六進位 0x7F 位元組，位元組值，是以零擴充成 Unicode 字元，結果會儲存在`chars`終止，以及陣列的任何移位序列。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要編碼的位元組是十六進位 0x81，產生的字元是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDecoder () As Decoder
public: override System::Text::Decoder ^ GetDecoder();

summary.span: 取得可以將以 UTF-7 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列的解碼器。

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: ，可以將以 UTF-7 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列。

span.span: A that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將序列的位元組區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，其方式類似這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留資料區塊的結尾的後隨位元組，並在下一步解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和進行網路傳輸，而檔案作業很實用是因為這些作業經常要處理而不是完整的資料流的資料區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以取得解碼器轉換 utf-7 編碼成字元序列的位元組。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain a decoder to convert the UTF-7 encoded bytes into a sequence of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CPP/getdecoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CS/getdecoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/VB/getdecoder-.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function GetEncoder () As Encoder
public: override System::Text::Encoder ^ GetEncoder();

summary.span: 取得可以將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 UTF-7 編碼的位元組序列的編碼器。

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: ，可以將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 UTF-7 編碼的位元組序列。

span.span: A that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將序列的位元組區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，其方式類似方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留資料區塊的結尾的後隨位元組，並在下一步解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和進行網路傳輸，而檔案作業很實用是因為這些作業經常要處理而不是完整的資料流的資料區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以取得將字元序列轉換成 utf-7 編碼器編碼的位元組序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain an encoder to convert a sequence of characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CPP/getencoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CS/getencoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/VB/getencoder-.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for the current object.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值方法不適合用來區別一個從另一個物件。The value returned by the method is not suitable for distinguishing one object from another. 如果您的應用程式需要唯一的雜湊程式碼，它應該覆寫方法。If your application needs a unique hash code, it should override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetMaxByteCount (int charCount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetMaxByteCount(int32 charCount) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetMaxByteCount (charCount As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetMaxByteCount(int charCount);

param.name: charCount
param.span: 要編碼的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to encode.

summary.span: 計算將指定數目的字元編碼所產生的最大位元組數目。

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

returns.span: 編碼指定字元數所產生的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 最差狀況的字，包括最壞的情況下，針對目前所選。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果是可能的大型字串、 選擇後援可以傳回較大的值。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, can return large values. 在大部分情況下，這個方法會傳回對小型字串合理的數字。In most cases, this method returns reasonable numbers for small strings. 大型字串，您可能選擇使用極大的緩衝區，在極少數的案例更合理地緩衝區超出攔截錯誤。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded. 您也可以考慮不同的方法，使用或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . Utf-7 ASCII 資料，每個字元，一個位元組編碼效率很高時就非常沒有效率的其他資料。While UTF-7 is very efficient at encoding ASCII data, one byte per character, it is extremely inefficient for other data. 如上述以來最壞的情況下處理。As remarked above, deals with a worst case. 如果要編碼的資料大部分都是 ASCII，而且特別是 ASCII 字元集中在一起，utf-7 大幅比較有效率使用這個方法所傳回的數字表示。If the data to be encoded is largely ASCII, and especially if the ASCII characters cluster together, UTF-7 is significantly more efficient than the number returned by this method suggests. 有沒有關係。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函數，以搭配，應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法傳回的編碼指定的字元數所需的位元組數目上限。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the maximum number of bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

exception.span: 發生後援 (如需完整說明，請參閱 [.NET Framework 中的字元編碼](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md))

span.span: A fallback occurred (see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) for complete explanation)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的字元，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting characters, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 最差狀況的字，包括最壞的情況下，針對目前所選。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果是可能的大型字串、 選擇後援可以傳回較大的值。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, can return large values. 在大部分情況下，這個方法會傳回對小型字串合理的數字。In most cases, this method returns reasonable numbers for small strings. 大型字串，您可能選擇使用極大的緩衝區，在極少數的案例更合理地緩衝區超出攔截錯誤。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded. 您也可以考慮不同的方法，使用或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . 有沒有關係。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函數，以搭配，應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxCharCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`。`GetMaxCharCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用解碼指定的位元組數所產生的方法來傳回最大字元數。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the maximum number of characters produced by decoding a specified number of bytes. MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetString (byte[] bytes, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetString(unsigned int8[] bytes, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetString (bytes As Byte(), index As Integer, count As Integer) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetString(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ bytes, int index, int count);

param.name: bytes
param.span: 包含要解碼之位元組序列的位元組陣列。

span.span: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.

param.name: index
param.span: 要解碼的第一個位元組索引。

span.span: The index of the first byte to decode.

param.name: count
param.span: 要解碼的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to decode.

summary.span: 將位元組陣列中的某一段位元組範圍解碼成字串。

span.span: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.

returns.span: ，包含將指定之位元組序列解碼的結果。

span.span: A containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能只適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 當遇到無效的位元組時，通常會發出的無效位元組。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果大於十六進位 0x7F 位元組，位元組值，是以零擴充成 Unicode 字元，結果會儲存在`chars`終止，以及陣列的任何移位序列。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要編碼的位元組是十六進位 0x81，產生的字元是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 基於安全性理由，建議您的應用程式使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將字串編碼成位元組陣列，然後再將位元組解碼回字串。The following code example encodes a string into an array of bytes, and then decodes the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CPP/getstring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CS/getstring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/VB/getstring.vb#1)]
